channel.title: How would i make food heal? still need help!
channel.description: hello im using devolutionscape Edited by me a bit( drop, rune defender (rune dagger) and some others) but since the max damage i hit so far is 42. (all player avialbale equip) i wanted to make food heal so people would actually live during pking. I really need help =\
